special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
[-1]: Add {R}. If Gericho, Ageless Wanderer entered this turn, add {R}{R} instead.
[0]: Exile Gericho and the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of loyalty counters on him. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn.
